text: 5 stars for this Cold Storage supermarket in the basement of Tanglin Mall. The best part is the staff that are so friendly, cheerful, and helpful. Love to come here to grocery shop. Place is clean and well kept and great variety of food.

This supermarket should be closed as hypermarket. It is huge inside, with fresh produce, bakery, a great selection of wines and beers and almost everything you need. Easy access. There's a bridge on the 2nd floor to connect to Jen Hotel.

CS fresh gold at Tanglin Mall is huge and carries a lot of groceries, cooked meat, freshly made bread, cheeses, daily essentials. It is located at Basement 1 of Tanglin Mall. As this is the CS Fresh "Gold", be aware that the prices of goods would be more expensive than usual. Nonetheless, it pays to have this huge array of products or produce in one place.
